column2: This task consists of refactoring BSP code. The instructions to carry out this category of tasks can be found at http://wiki.rtems.org/wiki/index.php/GoogleCodeInProjects#Refactoring_Board_Support_Packages. Before attempting this task

One of the Hello World tasks can be found at http://www.google-melange.com/gci/task/view/google/gci2013/5906609481973760 The problem statement for this particular task is : arm/gumstix : Move bsp_reset() in startup/bspstart.c to startup/bspreset.c
